event.title: Google Allo Download
event.description:
Google Allo is a smart messaging app that makes your conversations easier and more expressive. It’s based on your phone number, so you can get in touch with anyone in your phonebook. And with deeply integrated machine learning, Allo has smart features to keep your conversations flowing and help you get things done.

Google, the giant software firm has launched a new Messaging application called Allo at it prominent Google I/O Event 2016 held in New Delhi in the month of May. At the on-going event, Google has rolled out a new Messaging app “Allo” by showcasing the incredible features and usage of this new Messaging application. Alongside the new Allo Messaging app, Google also disclosed a new Video Calling app called Duo that allows its users to begin a chat conversation with their friends and cherished ones.

Google has made an announcement this new instant messenger application Allo, which is a simple messaging app that intends to offers its users the best app to make a chat conversation with your much-loved ones regardless of the platform on which the user is working on. Even, this new Google AlloMessaging application Download for Android works pretty much faster no matter how rapid your speed of internet connection or Wi-Fi speed is. Here is all you need to know about the Google AlloMessaging app for Android, iOS, PC, Mac, Blackberry and much more. Take a look!
